com.github.fge.grappa.misc

Class Reference<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.fge.grappa.misc.Reference<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Var

    public class Reference<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple container holding a reference to another object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Reference()
      Create a new Reference with a null value.
      Reference(T value)
      Create a new Reference to the given value object.
